emails.subject: Monthly IT Security Update
emails.body:
Dear Employee,
Please review the latest security policies attached.

emails.subject: Urgent: Password Reset Required
emails.body: We've detected suspicious activity on your account. Please reset your password immediately: http://secure-login.com/reset

emails.subject: New Company Benefits Program
emails.body: We have updated our benefits package. Click here to see the details: http://company.com/benefits

emails.subject: CONFIDENTIAL: Salary Increase Proposal
emails.body: We are considering a salary increase for you. Please confirm your bank details here: http://secure-finance.com/update
